mapper.select: SELECT max(resume_no) FROM tbl_resumes WHERE username = #{username} AND delete_yn = 'N'
SELECT * FROM tbl_resumes WHERE username = #{username} and savedraft = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_resumes WHERE username = #{username} and savedraft = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_resumes SET resume_title = #{resumeTitle}, resume_my_title = #{resumeMyTitle}, resume_my_content = #{resumeMyContent}, resume_pubilce_yn = #{resumePubilceYn}, salary = #{salary}, career = #{career}, savedraft = '0' WHERE resume_no = #{resumeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.application_no) AS applyCount, r.* FROM tbl_resumes r LEFT JOIN tbl_apply_status a ON r.resume_no = a.resume_no WHERE r.username = #{username} AND r.savedraft = '0' AND r.delete_yn = 'N' GROUP BY r.resume_no
SELECT count(*) AS count FROM tbl_resumes WHERE username = #{username} AND savedraft = '0' AND delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT a.resume_no, a.application_no, a.apply_status_gbn_code, b.application_title, b.username, c.name AS companyName FROM tbl_apply_status a JOIN tbl_applications b ON a.application_no = b.application_no JOIN tbl_companys c ON b.username = c.username WHERE a.resume_no = #{resumeNo};

SELECT s.resume_no, s.application_no, a.application_title, c.name AS companyName, r.resume_title, s.apply_status_gbn_code FROM tbl_apply_status s JOIN tbl_applications a ON s.application_no = a.application_no JOIN tbl_resumes r ON s.resume_no = r.resume_no JOIN tbl_companys c ON a.username = c.username WHERE s.regist_id = #{username}
